# Messages.getFallback() method

Get the list of fallback locales

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
getFallback(locale?: string | null): string[];
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  locale | string \| null | If empty or undefined, defaults to <code>this.locale</code> |

<b>Returns:</b>

string\[\]
